debiased.crossvalidation.scorers.scorer module¶

class debiased.crossvalidation.scorers.scorer.Scorer(settings)¶

Bases: object

This class is the super class of all objects that score classifier performances to be passed on into the ‘cross_validate’ and ‘gridsearch’ function.

get_name()¶
get_notation()¶
get_optim_croissant()¶
get_optim_function()¶
get_optim_scoring()¶
set_optimiser_function(optim_scoring='roc_auc') → make_scorer¶

This function creates a make scorer object that calls _optim_sk_function to make the arguments (ytrue, ypred) compatible with the rest of our scorer

Parameters:

optim_scoring (str, optional) – metric of the scorer. Defaults to ‘roc_auc’.

Returns:

sklearn object compatible with gridsearch. Also saves it under self._optim_function

Return type:

make_scorer
